subject: Re: Trades Platform Acceptance Email - Amendments Please

full_threads.body:
Hi Danielle,

We have made a validation feature for "Trade Manager 1-3". That it needs to be a valid email. 
We have setup a notification to go "trades manager 1" and Sbekkeli@novaricollective.com.

Just confirming this is the final link the team can start using?

Also, can I please confirm when a client sign off.. the sign off email gets sent to the selected trades manager and Sbekkeli@novaricollective.com

Hi Joel, On the client facing link https://trades.novaricollective.com.au/secure/?prop=WVpzcHR3TXBTZlV1cUpRb2xlb2pIdz09&address=1-smith-street-beechworth Can you please make the following changes;
  1. Please ensure headings are consistent (i.e. some are all caps first letter and others only first word starts with a capital). We would like only first word starts with a capital.
  1. second section to be 'Transformations" I.e. plural
  1. Under heading Maximize Your Sale Price and sentence please add 3 bullet points
  • All your trades & services managed under one roof
  • Qualified and insured trades people
  • Always on time and budget
  1. Please Change wording under Your Investment SCOPE OF WORKS to Scope Of Works please the same with Optional Scope Of Works
  1. Change heading of PAY UP FRONT to only read PAY UP FRONT if the payment schedule is all upfront. If payment schedule is over 2 or more payments please change heading to read PAY BY INSTALLMENT
  1. When new schedule of payment is complete, please change pay up front box text to read as the same schedule chosen

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath


Thanks again for all your hard work, below are the notes regarding the acceptance email received from the trades platform when the client signs off on a quote




Body of text in email


Thank you for choosing Novari Projects for your upcoming transformation!

Please see the attached file for a copy of your accepted proposal.

For a copy of our terms and conditions, please click here.





Few changes to the PDF/Subject line

  1. The email subject line still says 'Advantage Property Styling' - needs to be Novari Projects
  2. Can we change the way the PDF is named:
    - The address needs to have capital letters.
    - The part after the address that I've highlighted needs to be removed:

    - Proposal needs a capital 'P'

  1. PDF needs to say 'Projected Start Date' - it still says 'Install Date
  2. I think that the heading 'Novari Project Transformation' needs to be in capitals, to match the other headings
  3. I think the Project Transformation images need to be much larger in the PDF as well.

  1. Get rid of the text under 'SCOPE OF WOKRS'
  2. Assuming the highlighted will be removed:




  1. Delete the highlighted:










Danielle Stefanovic
Business Development Manager

0404 855 287 | dstefanovic@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019
novaricollective.com.au
